title: Don’t believe your eyes
description:
They say seeing is believing but often when we’re faced with the strange and unusual we’re skeptical if it’s real. That instant, that moment of hesitation can be the difference between life and death. A high price to pay, if you don’t believe your eyes.
First, when your safe place becomes your nightmare.
Then, family heirlooms that will be the death of you. 
Followed by, a voice in your head begging for help. 
And finally in our featured story, it’s not a ghost, if the person isn’t dead. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
